title: File Transfer over WiFi without internet using python
description: Transfer files wirelessly between two devices connected to the same WiFi network without using the internet, using a simple Python script with socket programming and a lightweight file server.

title: Face Recognition with simple numpy
description: A NumPy-based face recognition system using the Eigenfaces algorithm. This lightweight implementation processes images into eigenvectors for facial analysis and identification, with no external ML dependencies

title: Chat over WiFi
description: Building a chat server over a network accessible only to people connected through a same wifi aiming for secure way of communication
